name: Paper Weather
description:
In Paper Weather, players will harness the power of the weather to create storms and natural disasters. Starting from small warm fronts and cold fronts, players will be able to build them up to intense natural disasters, like hurricanes and tornadoes! Players will also receive information to store in their weather journal. This is where they can learn about the science behind all of the formation of the weather they create. Take control of the weather and learn science along the way in Paper Weather!

Controls

Desktop: Click and drag on the tiles to move them. Clicking on a tile will bring up its info tab, where you can see facts and view any infographics you have unlocked!

Mobile: Tap and drag on the tiles to move them. Tapping on a tile will bring up its info tab, where you can see facts and view any infographics you have unlocked!
